bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
lemenkov ~/work/brno-golang-meetup-2016-1 (git::master): GOPATH="/usr/share/gocode" present brno-golang-meetup-2016-1.slide 2016/08/26 13:16:36 Failed to parse templates: open /usr/share/gocode/src/golang.org/x/tools/cmd/present/templates/action.tmpl: no such file or directory lemenkov ~/work/brno-golang-meetup-2016-1 (git::master):
I believe these templates as well as the corresponding static content in 'static' subdirectory must be packaged as well. Otherwise the package is useless.
https://github.com/golang/tools/tree/master/cmd/present/static https://github.com/golang/tools/tree/master/cmd/present/templates
These templates were packaged at least in golang-googlecode-tools-devel-0-3.0.hga7e14835e46b.fc23.noarch.rpm package:
http://mirror.yandex.ru/fedora/linux/releases/23/Everything/x86_64/os/Packages/g/golang-googlecode-tools-devel-0-3.0.hga7e14835e46b.fc23.noarch.rpm
So this is certainly a regression.
